SEARCH
Package com.gaminghub.app.presentation.dto

Class OrderViewModel

java.lang.Object
com.gaminghub.app.presentation.dto.OrderViewModel
public class OrderViewModel extends Object
View model representing an order, combining domain data with associated customer and order item details for presentation purposes.

This class wraps an OrderModel domain object and enriches it with CustomerViewModel and a list of OrderItemViewModel objects. It also calculates the total order amount dynamically based on the associated order items.
